page.title: 11WOOD PRODUCTS
page.content: At{Tavistock Woodlands}sawmill { {Mr.Wills }and 2 others make different things with the wood from the forest. They use soft wood mainly Douglas Fir. They make 4 different sorts of gate, 3 types of fence panel Garden gates 2 sizes of picnic table Customer's special orders Lots of fence stakes are also made. One man can make 10 gates a day or 6 picnic tables or 30 fence panels.The men work at least 40 hours a week.They have special machines to help them,2 morticers,special saws and jigs.The panels are put together with nail and staple guns. {Mr.Wills}has worked at {Tavistock {Woodlands }for almost 5 years. He has just helped to put in a new saw mill.
